p: There is no effective treatment to control the new coronavirus disease 2019 according to the World Health Organization (WHO) commentary. [ 7] According to clinical experience, antiviral drugs and symptomatic and supportive treatment are often used. However, its therapeutic effect still needs further evaluation. [ 8, 9] Therefore, it is imperative that we need to seek new treatment methods and measures to prevent the progression and prevalence of the disease. [ 10]
